author: costin
msg: Jasper may mangle our name ( pretty bad ), there is no guarante /foo/bar.jsp will
generate foo.bar class.( needed to test with other manglers )

author: costin
msg: The return code for "strange" urls can be 403 or 404. There is not an absolute rule
( IMHO 404 gives back less information about why we rejected - that can be good
for security ). The test should only make sure an error is returned.

author: costin
msg: Added method to find what entities were found by the mapper.
Resize the rule[] ( for complex mappings )
Use the configured class loader to find resources ( can be a thread class loader,
or something set by the caller )
Added simple debug method in case the resource is not found.
